#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
//char  str[100];
string str;
int n,x,i,count,n1;
cin>>n;
cin.ignore();
while(n--)
{
    getline(cin,str);
    //x=strlen(str);
    x=str.length();
    count=0;
    for(i=0;i<x;i+=6)
    {
        if(str[i]==str[i+4]&&str[i+1]==str[i+3]||
           (str[i]==str[i+3]&&str[i+1]==str[i+4])||
           (str[i]==str[i+1]&&str[i+3]==str[i+4]))
            count++;
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
